description:
Designed without compromise by award-winning architect's bureau^proberts this exclusive release of residences offers you the opportunity to revel in the rare luxury of the world's finest finishes and superbly planned spaces.

Residence 23 at The Peninsula is 264sqm of opulent living, high up on Level Five. Designed to capture every aspect of the panoramic river and sweeping city views from its exquisitely appointed living and dining spaces, this amazing home also features three bedrooms, soaring ceilings,
full height glass and expansive balconies. No detail has been overlooked in our efforts to deliver you a new height of refined luxury.

Upon arrival, you will be greeted by your private entry gallery, expansive 2.8m ceilings and herringbone timber flooring. Immersive living spaces are anchored by the warmth of a natural stone fireplace and encompass floor-to-ceiling glass that opens seamlessly to an expansive balcony embracing the panoramic riverfront views.

The carefully curated kitchen, destined to be the centerpiece of your home, features a generous butler's pantry, premium Gaggenau cooking appliances and an abundance of storage. Designed to complement, your new home will also showcase a crafted natural stone bar with LED feature lighting making it the perfect place for you to entertain.

Your private master suite will be your ultimate retreat, offering a sense of space and intimacy and boasting an opulent ensuite, lavish walk-in wardrobe and calming views of the beautiful river below.

A further two bedrooms with ensuites and a dedicated media room complete the living areas of your luxurious residence.

Behind a secure entry gate, a private three-car garage means you can be assured that your security is of the utmost importance at The Peninsula.

An atrium rainforest with delicately curated sub-tropical gardens, a tranquil water ravine and a large feature tree will greet you and your guests in the foyer, ensuring a grand sense of arrival into your new home. With a concierge at your fingertips, you will also benefit from the privileges of tailor-made services to ease and enhance your everyday lives.

Celebrating Brisbane's subtropical lifestyle, you will also be treated to a rooftop oasis with panoramic views of the city skyline. As a resident of The Peninsula, you will exclusively enjoy world-class amenities with an infinity edge lap pool, magnesium wellness spa and infrared sauna. The expansive rooftop will also be home to a private fitness club, with the latest Technogym equipment and yoga lawn shaded beneath established trees.

Take your entertaining to new heights with a poolside private dining room and wine cellar available for residents to enjoy whilst embracing the mesmerizing horizon.

"Peninsula is of the highest quality design and will be finished to perfection. Located in the Paris end of New Farm, no other position on Oxlade Drive rivals this exceptionally rare and unique address. Truly nothing compares" – Kevin Seymour AM, Seymour Group Founder & Chairman.

We invite you to discover New Farm's ultimate expression of luxurious riverfront living at our Display Suite, Open 10am – 12pm Thursday - Sunday or alternatively, please call to book your private appointment.
